name: onlineplace
description:
A multiplayer game for hanging out with your friends. Walk around the large canvas, chat, and draw using the simple and intuitive controls.

Onlineplace includes text-based communication, a large empty plane to walk around, and a simple drawing tool.

The server software is easy to use, and all you need to control your character is a mouse. The game uses a small amount of RAM, and is not CPU intensive, so it can run well on low-end devices.

A computer with at least 1GB of RAM and a CPU with more than one core is recommended for playing the game.
